targets.rawSql: SELECT metric,floorplan,place,cts,route FROM "{{TIME_TABLE}}" WHERE metric like '%WNS'

panels.title: WNS of path groups across stages

targets.rawSql: SELECT metric,floorplan,place,cts,route FROM "{{TIME_TABLE}}" WHERE metric like '%TNS'

WITH formatted_panel AS (
    SELECT
        CASE 
            WHEN metric = 'floorplan_density(%)' THEN 'floorplan'
            WHEN metric = 'place_density(%)' THEN 'place'
            WHEN metric = 'cts_density(%)' THEN 'cts'
            WHEN metric = 'route_density(%)' THEN 'route'
        END AS density_type,
        value
    FROM (SELECT * FROM {{RUN_TABLE}} 
where metric like '%density%')
)
SELECT 
    'Density(%)' AS parameter,
    MAX(CASE WHEN density_type = 'floorplan' THEN value END) AS floorplan,
    MAX(CASE WHEN density_type = 'place' THEN value END) AS place,
    MAX(CASE WHEN density_type = 'cts' THEN value END) AS cts,
    MAX(CASE WHEN density_type = 'route' THEN value END) AS route
FROM formatted_panel;

WITH formatted_panel AS (
    SELECT
        CASE 
            WHEN metric LIKE 'floorplan_power(%)' THEN 'floorplan'
            WHEN metric LIKE 'place_power(%)' THEN 'place'
            WHEN metric LIKE 'cts_power(%)' THEN 'cts'
            WHEN metric LIKE 'route_power(%)' THEN 'route'
        END AS stage,
        CASE
            WHEN metric LIKE '%(Internal)' THEN 'internal power'
            WHEN metric LIKE '%(switching)' THEN 'switching power'
            WHEN metric LIKE '%(leakage)' THEN 'leakage power'
            WHEN metric LIKE '%(total)' THEN 'total power'
        END AS power_type,
        value
    FROM {{RUN_TABLE}} 
    WHERE metric ILIKE '%power%'
)
SELECT 
    stage,
    COALESCE(MAX(CASE WHEN power_type = 'internal power' THEN value END), 0) AS "internal power",
    COALESCE(MAX(CASE WHEN power_type = 'switching power' THEN value END), 0) AS "switching power",
    COALESCE(MAX(CASE WHEN power_type = 'leakage power' THEN value END), 0) AS "leakage power"
FROM formatted_panel
GROUP BY stage
ORDER BY 
    CASE stage 
        WHEN 'floorplan' THEN 1
        WHEN 'place' THEN 2
        WHEN 'cts' THEN 3
        WHEN 'route' THEN 4
    END;

SELECT 
    'floorplan' AS run,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric = 'floorplan_combo_area' THEN value END) AS combinational_area,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric = 'floorplan_buffer_area' THEN value END) AS buffer_area,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric = 'floorplan_physical_area' THEN value END) AS physical_area,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric = 'floorplan_icgs_area' THEN value END) AS icgs_area,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric = 'floorplan_latch_area' THEN value END) AS latch_area
FROM 
    {{RUN_TABLE}}
WHERE 
    metric ILIKE '%floorplan%area%'

SELECT 
    'place' AS run,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric = 'place_combo_area' THEN value END) AS combinational_area,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric = 'place_buffer_area' THEN value END) AS buffer_area,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric = 'place_physical_area' THEN value END) AS physical_area,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric = 'place_icgs_area' THEN value END) AS icgs_area,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric = 'place_latch_area' THEN value END) AS latch_area
FROM 
    {{RUN_TABLE}}
WHERE 
    metric ILIKE '%place%area%'

SELECT 
    'cts' AS run,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric = 'cts_combo_area' THEN value END) AS combinational_area,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric = 'cts_buffer_area' THEN value END) AS buffer_area,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric = 'cts_physical_area' THEN value END) AS physical_area,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric = 'cts_icgs_area' THEN value END) AS icgs_area,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric = 'cts_latch_area' THEN value END) AS latch_area
FROM 
    {{RUN_TABLE}}
WHERE 
    metric ILIKE '%cts%area%'

SELECT 
    'route' AS run,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric = 'route_combo_area' THEN value END) AS combinational_area,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric = 'route_buffer_area' THEN value END) AS buffer_area,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric = 'route_physical_area' THEN value END) AS physical_area,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric = 'route_icgs_area' THEN value END) AS icgs_area,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric = 'route_latch_area' THEN value END) AS latch_area
FROM 
    {{RUN_TABLE}}
WHERE 
    metric ILIKE '%route%area%'

WITH formatted_overflow AS (
    SELECT
        CASE 
            WHEN metric LIKE 'place_overflow(%)' THEN 'place'
            WHEN metric LIKE 'cts_overflow(%)' THEN 'cts'
        END AS stage,
        CASE
            WHEN metric LIKE '%(H%)' THEN 'overflow_H'
            WHEN metric LIKE '%(V%)' THEN 'overflow_V'
        END AS overflow_type,
        value
    FROM (SELECT * FROM {{RUN_TABLE}} WHERE metric ILIKE '%overflow%')
)
SELECT 
    overflow_type AS parameter,
    COALESCE(MAX(CASE WHEN stage = 'place' THEN value END), 0) AS "place",
    COALESCE(MAX(CASE WHEN stage = 'cts' THEN value END), 0) AS "cts"
FROM formatted_overflow
GROUP BY overflow_type
ORDER BY 
    CASE overflow_type 
        WHEN 'overflow_H' THEN 1
        WHEN 'overflow_V' THEN 2
    END;

WITH formatted_panel AS (
    SELECT
        CASE 
            WHEN metric LIKE 'place_Hotspot(max)' THEN 'place'
            WHEN metric LIKE 'cts_Hotspot(max)' THEN 'cts'
            WHEN metric LIKE 'place_Hotspot(total)' THEN 'place'
            WHEN metric LIKE 'cts_Hotspot(total)' THEN 'cts'
        END AS category,
        CASE
            WHEN metric LIKE '%(max)' THEN 'max_hotspot'
            WHEN metric LIKE '%(total)' THEN 'total_hotspot'
        END AS parameter,
        value
    FROM (SELECT * FROM {{RUN_TABLE}} WHERE metric ILIKE '%hotspot%' AND metric NOT ILIKE 'floorplan%')
)
SELECT 
    parameter,
    MAX(CASE WHEN category = 'place' THEN value END) AS place,
    MAX(CASE WHEN category = 'cts' THEN value END) AS cts
FROM formatted_panel
GROUP BY parameter;

SELECT 
    'route' AS run,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric = 'route_combinational_count' THEN value END) AS combinational_count,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric = 'route_buffer_count' THEN value END) AS buffer_count,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric = 'route_sequential_count' THEN value END) AS sequential_count,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric = 'route_macro_count' THEN value END) AS macro_count,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric = 'route_latch_count' THEN value END) AS latch_count,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric = 'route_flop_count' THEN value END) AS flop_count
FROM 
    {{RUN_TABLE}}
WHERE 
    metric ILIKE '%route%count%'

SELECT 
    'place' AS run,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric = 'place_combinational_count' THEN value END) AS combinational_count,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric = 'place_buffer_count' THEN value END) AS buffer_count,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric = 'place_sequential_count' THEN value END) AS sequential_count,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric = 'place_macro_count' THEN value END) AS macro_count,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric = 'place_latch_count' THEN value END) AS latch_count,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric = 'place_flop_count' THEN value END) AS flop_count
FROM 
    {{RUN_TABLE}}
WHERE 
    metric ILIKE '%place%count%'

SELECT 
    'floorplan' AS run,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric = 'floorplan_combinational_count' THEN value END) AS combinational_count,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric = 'floorplan_buffer_count' THEN value END) AS buffer_count,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric = 'floorplan_sequential_count' THEN value END) AS sequential_count,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric = 'floorplan_macro_count' THEN value END) AS macro_count,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric = 'floorplan_latch_count' THEN value END) AS latch_count,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric = 'floorplan_flop_count' THEN value END) AS flop_count
FROM 
    {{RUN_TABLE}}
WHERE 
    metric ILIKE '%floorplan%count%'

SELECT 
    'cts' AS run,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric = 'cts_combinational_count' THEN value END) AS combinational_count,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric = 'cts_buffer_count' THEN value END) AS buffer_count,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric = 'cts_sequential_count' THEN value END) AS sequential_count,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric = 'cts_macro_count' THEN value END) AS macro_count,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric = 'cts_latch_count' THEN value END) AS latch_count,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric = 'cts_flop_count' THEN value END) AS flop_count
FROM 
    {{RUN_TABLE}}
WHERE 
    metric ILIKE '%cts%count%'
SELECT metric, floorplan, place, cts, route FROM {{TIME_TABLE}}

WITH formatted_qor AS (
    SELECT
        CASE 
            WHEN metric LIKE 'floorplan_%' THEN 'floorplan'
            WHEN metric LIKE 'place_%' THEN 'place'
            WHEN metric LIKE 'cts_%' THEN 'cts'
            WHEN metric LIKE 'route_%' THEN 'route'
        END AS stage,
        REGEXP_REPLACE(metric, '^(floorplan_|place_|cts_|route_)', '') AS parameter,
        value
    FROM (SELECT * FROM {{RUN_TABLE}})
)
SELECT 
    parameter,
    COALESCE(MAX(CASE WHEN stage = 'floorplan' THEN value END), 0) AS "floorplan",
    COALESCE(MAX(CASE WHEN stage = 'place' THEN value END), 0) AS "place",
    COALESCE(MAX(CASE WHEN stage = 'cts' THEN value END), 0) AS "cts",
    COALESCE(MAX(CASE WHEN stage = 'route' THEN value END), 0) AS "route"
FROM formatted_qor
GROUP BY parameter
ORDER BY parameter;
